quote: Fabulous!!! You do an outstanding job with your character. Just the right amount of everything. Perfect!! Bravos and cheers for you! Your castmates are excellent, too. Congratulations to all.
Congratulations on a part well played Calvin! It was a treat to see you in such a rich role.
Great thoughtful work tonight, superb choices, vulnerable with wit...I was very moved. Proud to witness the best thing you've ever done.
